programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2119
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep189
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Undiscovered Tomb
programme.desc: On the remote border between China and India, adventurer Ivy scours the land in search of the undiscovered tomb rumored to house the long-lost Pills of Eternity. However, she is not the only one searching for these powerful pills.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Baos wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yangs into battle to continue their husbands legacy.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome lifes challenges.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Popular make-up artist Sammy is hired as the CEO of a cosmetics company with all women staff. As he is clueless with women, he invites Arnold, a fellow make-up artist, to join and help him. Though Arnold might appear to be a woman's magnet, his heart still lingers with his first love, Mona.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Vengeance is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Lis wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Lis Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mothers death a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu-hsin (Pai Piao) of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman (Wang Jung) to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker (Ku Feng). When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh (Derek Yee) vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynastys Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, starring M. S. Bhaskar, Vaibhav Reddy, Karunakaran & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Fantasy Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, starring Ashok Selvan, Ritika Singh, and Vani Bhojan

programme.title: Sanam Bewafa

programme.title: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani

programme.title: I Am 24

programme.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to get married to an NRI. When she visits Delhi to shop for her trousseau, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree man, and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Direct Ishq
programme.desc: Vicky, a rough local of Varanasi, covets Dolly who wishes to become a professional singer. Complications ensue when Kabeer, a rich event organiser, takes a fancy to her while helping her succeed.

programme.title: Cinebuzz

programme.title: Hasee Toh Phasee
programme.desc: Nikhil is a struggling businessman who thinks he is in love with his girlfriend, Karishma, and wants to marry her. But he ends up falling in love with her smart, geeky and quirky sister, Meeta.

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: After his father disowns him, a businessman raises Surya like his own son. Years later, Surya transforms himself into Boss and fights for the rights of the deprived sections of society.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Sagar, Sam and Aarav decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship in order to help Sam clear his debt. However, one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania
programme.desc: A girl from Ambala, Kavya Pratap Singh, is about to get married to an NRI. When she visits Delhi to shop for her trousseau, she meets Humpty Sharma, a carefree man, and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Ek Ajnabee
programme.desc: Former army officer Suryaveer must protect a little girl Anamika whom he dislikes at first but eventually gets attached to. When Anamika gets kidnapped, he uses all his might to bring her back.

programme.title: Saajan Bina Suhagan
programme.desc: Asha is in love with Raj but her dying father begs her to marry another man. Years later, Raj walks back into her idyllic life throwing everything off balance.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra falls in love with Piya and soon marries her. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is soon diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Rocketry - The Nambi Effect
programme.desc: The life of Nambi Narayanan is full of struggles and accomplishments as an aerospace engineer. However, he faces his biggest challenge while working at ISRO when the world accuses him of treason.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna
programme.desc: When Hallers sister, Sophie, is abducted by a ruthless gang, he decides to pursue them without involving the police. Together with his assistant, Niko, they expertly use their wits and intelligence to outsmart the criminals and bring Sophie to safety.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusufs best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusufs calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.title: The Boy Who Wants To Live
programme.desc: 70-year-old Willi catches Malian refugee Nama stealing, but decides not to report him. Having been a refugee once, Willi sees a part of himself in Nama, and brings him home. However, Namas decision further frays his relationship with his son.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.desc: Ranging from a 60-year-old retiree who no longer finds herself desirable to a daughter trying to make her breakthrough as a model, five women of different ages confront their self-image and the expectation they have for themselves and the people around them.

programme.title: American Skin
programme.desc: Lincoln Jefferson, an Iraqi War veteran, working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Baltic Files I - The Body On The Beach
programme.desc: After being transferred to the German-Danish border, Chief Inspector Svenja is tasked with a case involving a body on a beach. With her new colleague Antione, she investigates a case which involves a liquor dealer and a tragedy that goes back decades.

programme.title: Clara's Kitchen
programme.desc: Clara is forced to stay at her grandmother Lucings house for the weekend after finding out her parents had just separated and the only way Lucing can communicate with her granddaughter is through what she knows and does best: her cooking.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Len enlist the help of Robertas non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Robertas eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: A Butterfly's Heart
programme.desc: Juozapas is a quiet boy who cultivates insects in an abandoned house. He has a big bulge under his weird sweater and the schools tough kids call him balloon. Rugil moves to town and becomes Juozapas friend. She is the first to discover his secret.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Exmoor - Kate enjoys an 11-mile walk in Exmoor along the South West Coast Path, regarded as one of the most beautiful coastal paths in the world. Starting at Porlock Weir, Kate heads to St Bueno's, a tiny parish church that seats just 33 worshippers - and which holds a dark past. She then heads inland to see the valley that inspired RD Blackmore's 1869 novel of outlaws and revenge, Lorna Doone.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Nurse Sharks - It's time to celebrate, as Steve Backshall's team of ten shark saviours have all passed their dive training and are now fully qualified scuba divers.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia - Joanna Lumley sets off on one her most epic voyages yet. A journey through the world's greatest spice continents. In this episode Joanna is heading to a collection of remote Indonesian islands. The Banda Islands were one the only place on earth where nutmeg grew.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep1
programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep2
programme.desc: A look at ready-to-blend fruit smoothies, and turning raw organic cocoa beans into chocolate bars. Plus the production of delicious paneer, and the story behind wasabi.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Southern Stingrays - Bad weather causes sea sickness among the team, and their next diving lesson has to be abandoned.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Nurse Sharks - It's time to celebrate, as Steve Backshall's team of ten shark saviours have all passed their dive training and are now fully qualified scuba divers.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Exmoor - Kate enjoys an 11-mile walk in Exmoor along the South West Coast Path, regarded as one of the most beautiful coastal paths in the world. Starting at Porlock Weir, Kate heads to St Bueno's, a tiny parish church that seats just 33 worshippers - and which holds a dark past. She then heads inland to see the valley that inspired RD Blackmore's 1869 novel of outlaws and revenge, Lorna Doone.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia - Joanna Lumley sets off on one her most epic voyages yet. A journey through the world's greatest spice continents. In this episode Joanna is heading to a collection of remote Indonesian islands. The Banda Islands were one the only place on earth where nutmeg grew.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ghost of the Reef - Off the coast of Tanzania lurks a fish so violent it is known to ram sharks to death and even attack humans. Cyril explores the area with some local fishermen.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep1

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ghost of the Reef - Off the coast of Tanzania lurks a fish so violent it is known to ram sharks to death and even attack humans. Cyril explores the area with some local fishermen.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep3
programme.desc: See how Caribbean-inspired candy bars are made, and irresistible polenta crisps, or a maple Danish. And watch how Alfredo risotto is made - a risotto so popular that more than 25 million are produced per year.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep4
programme.desc: See an organic spin on the classic cheese twist, or millions of bite-size mint chocolate patties. Plus, how 200 litres of vodka a month puts the zing in a special pasta sauce.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Forests - Sir David Attenborough journeys into the forests, where dogs communicate with whistles, treehoppers fight assassin bugs, 'spirit bears' fish, and hornbills imprison themselves in trees.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Cortina - The Dolomites & WW1 - This is an incredibly challenging hut-to-hut European alpine adventure, but what makes this trip unique is the frequent use of the 'via ferrata or 'exposed trails with secure cables'.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep2
programme.desc: Breaking Trail - As winter's grip in the Arctic strengthens, Alaskans are forced to react to avoid an icy demise.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep5
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at strawberry shortcake ice cream, delectable tacitos are hand-rolled by the hundreds, marshmallow-making in a race against time, and a broccoli slaw that is washed twice.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep6
programme.desc: See the production of irresistible protein-packed breakfast cereal; artisanal cream soda; vegan mayonnaise; and a quarter of a million churros that are dusted with cinnamon and flash-fried.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In this episode, on-board cameras transform our understanding of meerkats, chimps and penguins.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the third leg of his journey, Simon Reeve is travelling down the length of California.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep8
programme.desc: After the discovery of oil in the 1930s, the seas around Bahrain became damaged through increased shipping and spillages, and sea life was decimated. A huge engineering project was required to protect the environment and keep the trade flowing.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S9 Ep3
programme.desc: Cold Harvest - As the deep freeze sets in, Alaskans brave cruel temperatures to complete vital tasks.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep4
programme.desc: How Smart Are Sharks? - Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Herd Mentality - Many species of animals are adapted to live in large groups. The group gives them protection from predators, helps them find food and offers plenty of social contact. In this episode of Baby Animals we explore whats it like to grow up in some of these groups.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding an Empire - Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back, and even reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chasing Mako - In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep4
programme.desc: How Smart Are Sharks? - Often portrayed as mindless eating machines prone to attacking humans, sharks are more complex and intelligent than previously thought. Find out how these graceful top predators interact, choose friends, and even teach other sharks.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Chasing Mako - In some of the most-remote regions on the planet, researchers dive deep and brave danger to unlock secret shark behaviours, challenge myths about sharks, and fight for the protection of these supreme predators before its too late.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchins Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Joined at the Hip - The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ugly Cute - Not all baby animals are cute. Often, quirky physical traits are evolutionary adaptations that have helped a species survive. Visit four funny-looking youngsters, including a Baird tapir, two baby gelada baboons, an anteater and a Bactrian camel.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Animals Gone Wild - As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clans symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkats alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Primate Families - The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Foxes - Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Three Kings Islands/ Manawatwhi - Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: A weekly variety music show from Korea's SBS Prism Tower, showcasing some of the biggest names in K-Pop, where viewers vote for The Show Choice winner and results are announced weekly.

programme.title: MTV PUSH Presents: Armani White
programme.desc: Armani White chats to MTV about life, music and his rise to superstardom, and gives us exclusive performances of two of his tracks!

programme.title: MTV World Stage: Alicia Keys
programme.desc: MTV World Stage is your chance to see the biggest artists on the globe live in concert without leaving the comfort of your sofa.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2014
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2014 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep64
programme.desc: A Rider's Balance - After meeting her riding idols, Pru vows to practice until she's perfect even if it means missing out on a bonfire her best friends are planning.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep3
programme.desc: Harveyween / New Kid on the Block - Lotta has to save her friends while overcoming her fear of "Nighttime Halloween". The girls do their best to make the new kid on the block fall in love with Harvey Street.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep37
programme.desc: Twig Is Dead / Message Slab - Thinking Twig died under wet cement, the Mighty Ones make a statue of Twig and give him a funeral. / A phone falls into the yard while in autoplay mode. Twig and the others think the videos are instructions for living, but Berry feels like no one is listening to her.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep71
programme.desc: Pajuna Serves Spirits - Pajuna attempts to tell fortunes and gets possessed with an evil spirit, out to get revenge on Puss

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep37
programme.desc: Family On The Edge - When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep38
programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep21
programme.desc: Rupert and the Scarecrow - Rupert and the others meet a sad little scarecrow who's lonely and upset that the crows don't come near him.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert and the Octopus Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert and the Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out with spectacular results.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep21
programme.desc: How Can We Make Music For Mimi? - Mimi has lost the handle to her music box and can't hear her music. Jess works out how to make instruments and get all the friends involved in making a little orchestra and performing a fantastic song to cheer mimi up.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep22
programme.desc: How Can We Find Sammy Snail? - Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep23
programme.desc: Why Won't My Kite Fly? - Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep24
programme.desc: How Did A Dandelion Seed Get Into Mimi's Garden? - Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Olivia Ep43
programme.desc: Olivia Keeps A Secret - Mother is busy planning a birthday party for Francine, and Olivia wants to help. The big surprise TV star Kicky the Kangaroo -is due to make a special appearance. But when unexpected problems confront Kicky, Olivia has to step in and save Francine's party!

programme.title: Olivia Ep44
programme.desc: Olivia Gets Fit - In preparation for their class track and field day dubbed the Hogenmuller Games after their teacher -Olivia uses a unique training regiment to help her best friend Julian be the fastest runner he can be and to give herself a jump on the competition in her own event.

programme.title: Olivia Ep45
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Library - On a trip to the library with Father and Ian, Olivia hopes to renew her fantastic book so she can finish it. During story time the book goes missing and Olivia and Ian set off to find it. She just can't go home without knowing how the book ends!

programme.title: Olivia Ep46
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Wedding Gift - Olivia's favourite art teacher, Miss Davis, is getting married, and Olivia wants to find her the perfect wedding present. But despite all of her fundraising efforts, she only has enough for a very small gift. With help from her classmates, Olivia creates a very special card for Miss Davis to go along with the gift.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppys surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep31
programme.desc: Toddle-Lu, Mexico City - Odlulu wants her own quinceaera, a traditional Mexican celebration for a girl's 15th birthday, so she uses the Grow-Up Key to skip ahead a few years. But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep43
programme.desc: Tumbleweed Wrangler / The Extreme Bean Machine - Archibald is excited to visit Roxlyn for a western-themed day together in Saddlerock. However, when Saddlerock gets overrun with tumbleweeds, they are determined not to let them spoil their perfect day. / Needing a win, Cousin Ashley enters a road race that features car innovations. With Archibalds help, Ashley will try to overcome obstacles both mental and physical, all the while driving a car that runs on baked beans.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep65
programme.desc: Welcome Back Otter - Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep4
programme.desc: FruLess / Citizen Cape - The Harvey Girls set off to help unfriendly Frufru make friends in time birthday party! Dot gets a little carried away after starting a fashion-forward cape business.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.
